column4: Delicious pizza and fantastic ice cream! Great atmosphere with Italian music. Excellent service...Nicola is the number 1! See you soon, guys!!!

I am addicted to pizza, but I love the authentic Italian one. I chose the vegan pizza which was simply and tasty. I like the atmosphere and the background music. Thank you Nicola! I'll be back for sure!

column3: Can‚Äôt go wrong with any of the dishes!
column4: Fabulous service and the food was phenomenal. The ravioli was one of the best I have ever had and the Lasagna noodle with prosciutto, cheese and mushrooms was a favorite. It is worth the awards it has won.
Oven fresh well made pizzas with choice of wine, large pie, good for crowds. Great selection and ingredients. Great Pizza. I think they may have pasta too.
Our family has become snobby when it comes to pizza. Chain stores don‚Äôt cut it. THIS pizza wins an award! We all loved it. The sauce and toppings were fresh, and the crust was perfect. Spectacular!
Simple Italian cozy warm restaurant. Not too crowded, quiet. Food was delicious on a cold night, it was just what we wanted.
The service wasn‚Äôt the best and our utensils and cups were already dirty before we even sat down. Disappointed.

Italian food? The best, I really like them, and I keep trying out new restaurants.The pizza was one of my favorites, I ate spenotosand bruschetta, it was absolutely authentic.I love this place and you have to try it!
Restaurant with excellent value for their delicious pizzas. Authentic Italian atmosphere and efficient staff. Would highly recommend to anybody searching for good Italian pizza in New York City

Perfect! The pizza was absolutely perfect! The ingredients were fresh and delicious. We ordered a Rustica pizza and a Margarita pizza. Well done!! This is a cash only restaurant. Also, it is super tight seating.
Excellent pizza and service, the environment is cozy and the wine list is really good. Highly recommended
Probably the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had in my life! My wife loved her pasta and salad also. And the dessert was legit too! Server was sweet and attentive. Just a great West Village experience!

It was my friend's Birthday and we had dinner at Numero 28 Pizzeria before seeing a show. The pizza (Kale & Sausage) was delicious!!! The restaurant makes use of their limited space too. Highly recommend this restaurant if you are in the area.

A very good restaurant which led us to Italia even 5000 miles away. We were served by Gemma. Very careful to our needs, they adapt to us by taking time to explain how are made pizzas or pasta. I strongly recommend this place !

column3: Great place and the best pizza (bellissimo posto e pizza buonissima!)
column4: We ate a big pizza divided in different tastes. Everything was excellent! Thanks to Gemma and all very kind!!! Muchas gracias! Grazie mille
I love going to Pizza N28 for the the best food and the vibe of the people there. Gemma who served me is always nice and make me feel at home, which is one of the main reason why I got there.
We ate a wonderful pizza the Italian way ! the waitress Gemma was friendly and welcoming!! Great service !
Good pizzas available and the small ones are huge! Service was good but a bit distant. Only reason for the 4 vs 5 stars is the service and the bruschetta... do not order. It wasn‚Äôt good
We had a great dinner with delicous bruschetta and great pizza‚Äôs. Take a pizza for 2 to share, they will serve it on a nice wooden long board.
Fantastic authentic Italian restaurant!!! 100% recommend it for everyone who loves to eat good! That staff is lovely and kind also‚ù§Ô∏è
Amazing food and awesome atmosphere. Homemade Italian and they make you feel like family. A MUST GO if you come to New York.
The last pizza we had this good we were in Italy. A no nonsense but 1st class Italian restaurant. All 3 pizza's were superb ! Do note its cash only

column3: A REAL pizza, in the heart of the Greenwich Village
column4: Amazing place and the best pizza. The quality of the ingredients is top level as well as the service. It is comparable to the bests pizza i've tasted in Rome or Napoli. Authentic and genuine. Highly suggested! Approved by Italians üòâ
we were delighted to find a low-keyed restaurant with charming staff, who relished serving us delicious home-made past, perfectly al dente, in a small spot in Greenwich Village.

Came here for a quick bite toveat by a tour guides recommendation. And I couldn't recommend enough myself. Two of us shared a pizza between us and there was plenty for both of us. But please remember its cash only!

The pizza is really great - thin crust well done. Absolutely delicious! The appetizers (eggplant parmigiana & the meatballs) were ok but just ok. And the wine selection is very limited. But the pizza is really good.
Numero 28 approaches pizza quite a number of ways. Also, $22 for spaghetti is a rather bold move for a venue like this.

Was really looking forward to dining here on recommendation of a family member. The pizza was yummy and the wine serving generous but the wait staff left alot be desired. Waitress was very nonchalant with no personality.

The atmosphere was relaxed and casual. A small gem of a restaurant with a fun pizza menu, salads and pastas. We were not rushed. They seemed like they could use an extra waiter or two, but the food came out quickly and was delicious.
Enjoyed the margarita pizza and the grilled octopus, with their fantastic homemade bread and fresh olive oil. Paired with delicious wine.
I will go to Italy in June, but this is one of the best pizza I ever eat! well done guys. I didn't expect that

Friends and I have visited this gem numerous times. We have tried the pizza and oh my god! So tasty!!! The best one in town! Highly recommended. Desserts are quite tasty as well. Service is top notch.
One of the best pizzeria in NYC. You guys also have to try the tiramis√π! One of the best I have ever tried
I really like this place. Possibly my favorite restaurant in Nyc. The pizza is fantastic and their Spaghetti 28 is also delicious.

column3: Delicious food, beautiful spot, friendly ambiance
column4: Delicious pizza, artichoke salad, and friendly staff at one of the prettiest blocks in the city. Plenty of outdoor seating, you never wait long for your food, and they‚Äôre very accommodating to pop-ins. Love this place!
Food, service and the environment was absolutely awesome. Best pizza around. We feel like we‚Äôre back in Italy!

Spent a happy couple of hours there enjoying pizza, lasagne and a quinoa salad with chicken . All were excellent - beautifully presented and tasty Service was efficient friendly and smooth Great place to dine al fresco in good weather
This place never fails to impress me and my friends . It‚Äôs almost like the pizza has a soul. And As a bonus the food is excellent and not to expensive! A great deal all around .

Delicate crust with artichoke, melted mozzarella, mushrooms, fresh tomato sauce, drizzled artistically with truffle cream (perhaps from the truffle oil specialty shop next door?) was divine. I chose the intimate main dining room over the brick oven-warmed side room. Service: excellent.
Undoubtedly the best pizza I have ever eaten and I have been here often. Try the Numero28 signature dish world class in particular the truffle cream. Lots of love to you all
Great Italian restaurant in the Washington Square area. Service was outstanding and the food was great. Very reasonably priced for NYC. Will definitely be back. Loved the way way they serve pizza.
We had an excellent meal here. Pizza was unreal. Nice, attentive service. It is not cheap but worth it.

Had dinner with friends and the overall experience was perfect. The place is really nice and quite, the pizza was excellent and they have a good selection of wines. The girl that attended us, Cristina, was lovely and really helpful. I'll definitely try it again.
First time at New York, we heard about it last week. Everything was perfect! Attention, dishes, price! All in one! Congrats!
Loved the bruschetta and that they have many choices of pizza! My friends enjoyed the place and I will try it again!
The food was good but the waitress provided a VERY BAD service without any attention , she even forgot to bring the things we asked . Very poor service . It wasnt even crowded !
Real Italian pizza, with fresh Italian products! Probably the best pizzeria in New York city...no doubts!

The ambiance is magnificent and the waiters were friendly. The food is exceptional as well. The place is located on a street where many restaurants are located in Miami Beach Florida. Received a certificat for best food from TripAdvisor

Good menu. Great pizza. I really liked this place. Owner/operator was very friendly and helpful. Quite possibly the best pizza I have ever had. Better than any that I ate in Italy. Go try, you won‚Äôt be disappointed.

Pizza and pasta was excellent. Had the largest pizza for 4 of us and had two different selections and couldn‚Äôt finish it. Had reasonable wine selection. Good service and atmosphere in a nice part of New York. Need to pay with cash.

column3: Good quality pizza and outside seating
column4: We ate here before the Halloween parade and it was perfectly located for that. Nice to be able to sit outside in New York. Decent brick oven pizza.
Excellent Pizza. We went at lunch time based on the ratings from many others and they were right. Excellent service and food.

column3: Good salad and very nice pizza
column4: I had the pear salad and my partner the diavolo pizza, they were both very nice and also the service was fast and good. Very kind waiters.
Nice pizza place in the Village. I loved their pizza and the salads. Friendly service and nice location
This is truly one of the best Italian restaurants in Nyc.The pizza is amazing and the closest we have had to authentic pizza from Naples.The pasta is delicious as well.

Had the meatballs and then a Diavola pizza. The crust was ideal. The sauce and toppings were good and pretty traditional, but I wouldn't say the most flavourful. The restaurant was pretty quiet when we were there a little before 6 on a weekday.
Food is great. Love the Delicata pizza. Cacio e pepe special pasta was awesome. Cute place. Nothing fancy. Fabricio was a great waiter. Have been before. Will be back. Cash üí∞ only!

column3: Best pizza in NYC! Authentic Italian Pizza
column4: Amazing pizza ordered by the inch. Super delicious, authentic Italian pizza. Loud, crowded and cash only with crazy Italian staff -- I think part of the charm!! üòÅüëçüëçüëç
Excellent. Visiting with old friends. Like being in Italy. Authentic Naples pizza. You can taste the freshness in every bite Fun atmosphere. Cash only
This is simply one of the best pizza places I have ever been to, and certainly by far the best pizza outside of Italy. And yes, their espresso is also authentic Italian. Outstanding!
The coal-fired pizza was very good. Great ingredients - roasted peppers, sausage and pepperoni. Sat outside on a glorious day in the city. You won't be disappointed.

This place was great, the waitresses were really attentive and friendly. The food was fabulous and walking through the East Village to get here was really cool. We had the Margherita and the Diavola and they were both really good.
I went to Numero 28 Pizzeria with a group of friends during Spring Break, and had the most delicious Riganella Pizza. The Buffalo Mozzarella almost melts in your mouth!
Pizza great, had the buffalina, the tomato sauce was really fresh and the mozzarella was amazing. Nice crust. Great service. Highly recommend if looking for pizza.
It is a small cozy restaurant with a very friendly and polite staff. We had no reservation but they were able to accommodate us. The service was quick and very efficient and the food was excellent.

column3: Amazing pizza made in authentic Italian style
column4: Dropped by for a late lunch with my partner and we both loved the authentic style of these pizzas - with that chewy base and minimalistic style toppings. Would recommend booking for dinner especially on weekends.

column3: One of the best in the city
column4: Pizza's here are great, there is no doubt. Authentic italian taste, great menu and friendly staff. I'll be back for more pizza, you should go there too.
Me and my husband are huge pizza lovers and everyone was recommending this place to us and it was the best pizza ever ! Maybe it was new york or i don't know but it was the best for me !
Lunch was good. Pizza and soup were tasty and good size. Was a pleasant meal but the place wasn't very warm inside.
We had a nice meal in the quaint pizza shop of soup and pizza pepperoni. It was tasty and wood fired. It‚Äôs a little cold in the shop.
Cozy place, great service and an amazing pizza! The price is fair and the quality is amazing! I went with my wife to celebrate our Christmas Eve far from home! It was amgreat pick!
This was a great little find. A fab Italian in a great location. The food was very good, the calamari was delicious, the ravioli was tasty and the pizzas were great. Highly recommend.
Authentic food, good atmosphere, especially i the back room by the oven. Great Pizza, excellent dough. Prices absolutely moderate and appropriate. Espresso too small. Still one of our favorites

column3: Best pizza I've had in a long time
column4: From The oven the pizza is made in to the red sauce. This restaurant just has an amazing Pizza and tiramisu. I can only advise anyone to try it.

West villages most authentic Italian pizza place. Constantly fresh ingredients and hand made pies whether your getting slices or a full pizza. Always friendly and welcoming staff who remember us from previous visits
Really one of the best pizza that I had.Very tasty.Good staff and nice place.If you visit New York you have to visit this place as well.We really enjoy our food.

column3: Not maybe.....THE BEST pizza in NYC!
column4: We come to NYC just for this pizza. It‚Äôs worth the hour drive. We look for pizza everywhere we go and compare it to this restaurant. STILL haven‚Äôt found better!!! LOVE THIS PLACE! Thank you Numero28!!!
Really lovely food, nice atmosphere - feels very authentic. Would recommend to anybody looking for a nice, relaxed meal.
This was a special find. Recommended by a friend who I know knows good pizza. He was spot on. Casual, great service and a super üçï
Awesome pizzas, awesome service. We were in six people and we took 5 different pizzas (you can choose the size you prefer) and one pasta e fagioli with a classic bruschettaüòä Very recommend üòÅ
Excellent service, even when they were busy. We tried the pumpkin pizza and the penne pasta and both came out outstanding. It is not the cheapest place but it is way worth it!!
Had a great evening at this amazing pizzeria. Very delicious pizzas. Quite chaotic- but great and loose atmosphere.
Amazing Gluten free pizza crust! Pizzas were delicious! Great Italian atmosphere! And Fantastic desserts: chocolate Nutella pannacotta, mascarpone cheesecake were perfect !!!
That service was average at best. The foccacia was delicious and the cheese on the pizza was very fresh. I'd go again just to see if the service was a fluke.
Amazing pizza and lovely people! I go there quite often and I've always been very satisfied. Buonissima!
One of the best brick oven pizza's I have tasted - Excellent ! Really enjoyed the atmosphere and the service along with a great meal
Everyone enjoyed their meals. My babies ( 2 & 4 years old) ate all their food - pizza and pasta. Antipasti was yummy. Adults enjoyed their food as well. Wine was nice too.
Have no doubt that you will eat the best Italian pizza in the neighborhood when you come ask for Valeria!
All around solid meal! The service was B+. Definitely order a pizza and eat there while it's fresh!!

This place is by far the best pizzeria in the entire city. The staff and owners are super friendly and it's absolutely beautiful to sit outside at night in such an amazing neighborhood. Highly recommend.
Awesome pizza, friendly staff, great vibe . I always come here from New Jersey. If you drive in after 7 there's free parking around.
On a Greenwich Village tasting tour we stopped here. The pizza was outrageous -- thin and crispy crust. Eugenia our host was welcoming and the service was top notch.

Fresh, simple and delicious across the board. $10pp for BYOB is one of the best deals in NYC, especially for scenic West Village. Roberta and accompanying staff were attentive and considerate at all times. I nativi Italiani sarebbero contenti, onestamente. Grazie Roberta
I always visit this place when I am in NY l. For me they are the best pizzas in the city. Also the people working here are very friendly. I will come back next time I visit the City

Pizza was good with a good selection of Italian beer : Moretti, Menabrea . I enjoy also the desert very good . People super kind .... the only point , they don't accept card and I discover it at the end !

column3: Great pizza, do not miss it
column4: Italian pizzeria that must be definitely run by Italian owners, since the pizza tastes like a real Italian one. If you're willing to have a tasteful Italian appetizer and a good pizza, do not forget to hit this Italian corner
When we need a good pizza in NY... pizzeria 28 is a must place to go. The truffle pizza with mushrooms is delicious.

Went with family to the pizza place. Strongly recommend making reservations in advance. The pizzas are fresh and served hot. They don't accept credit cards but have ATM on the premises so you can withdraw money to pay.
Had one of their specialty pizza's and the crust was mostly soggy and cheese was overly salty. Felt not much care was taken in making my pizza - off night perhaps?
Stopped here by chance and it showed to be very good choice. Good food, lasagna and spaghetti with meatballs at very good. Fast serving with great service.

This is a darling little pizza place where the staff is wonderfully friendly and accomodating. The treaditional New York style pizza was amazing!! Be prepared they do not accept credit cards although there is an ATM on the premises.
This is my absolute favorite restaurant in NYC. I come every time I visit the city. Amazing pizza, pasta and warm and friend service. This time I brought my family and they loved it also!
Casual place with a nice terrace and very good pizza. Portions are big so bring your appetite. This was our first visit but it won't be our last.

Best pizza in NYC. My boyfriend is italian and he finds the food very authentic!we've already been twice and will definitely come more often. Very nice atmosphere and extremely kind service. Highly recommended!!!
One of the greatest pizzeria in New York and a very nice staff. They were very helpful and welcoming.
So good we went twice on our 5 day NY trip 2nd time walked all the way from the Empire State observatory, if you can't decide which Pizza you can have half and half.

We watched football match, was a lot of emotion. They have really good pizzas!!! Service was nice! But the most important thing is that you can watch the EURO 2016 championship match, AMERICAN BOYS DOES NOT INTEREST TO SPORT IN EU! My boyfriend was happy
We have been there on July 20th. While family enjoyed the excellent Pizzas. What is definitely not good - especially for tourists - they ONLY ACCEPT CASH. So this is a down side.

column3: Old time NYC sit down, down town pizza parlor
column4: Very good, surprisingly authentic NY Italian pizza restaurant. Great thin crust with lots of delicious toppings, including a white truffle prosciutto rocket. The margarita pie was also outstanding. I'm very picky about pizza, Numero 28 is worthy of its praise! Well worth the time.
Amazing pizza, It`s addictive so gooooood. The best is the one with tartufo (truffle). It`s the only place where I can have two pizzas in a row.
Quaint little spot!! Loved the pizza so much, we went 3 times the 5 days in NYC. I'm a pizza junkie and it's my favorite ever!!!Go!!

People are great and accommodating, food is excellent and really Italian (I was born and raised there so I know what I am talking about...). Valeria, one of the waitresses, is friendly and customer oriented.
Pizza margarita was very good. Good staff. Nice location! Menu is very good. Definitely recommend. Love it.
Good Pizza. Thin crispy crust. Really good sauce on the red pies. Also tried their signature pie, the Numero 28, also very good. Nice atmosphere and location, good service.
Had some pizza for lunch, all well done as well as the homemade pasta. Washed down with Brooklyn Lager. Happy.

column3: Go and enjoy a great meal
column4: Nice italian place to go. The Pizza was great, and also the Pasta. Great taste, the pizza was made in a brick oven ... awesome !!!
Excellent location in Greenwich Village with great outdoor seating on a nice night. Great pizza and I enjoyed a pasta plate as well. Cash only and place is always packed, That says a lot.
Awesome salad, excelent pizza and great service. I would recommend this place. The neighborhood is filled with a lot of restaurants and coffee places but definitely this place is among the best.
Get the numero 28 pizza - it's one of the best pizzas I've ever had! Quaint little place with good wine and great pizza.
I have been there several times and still is my favorite pizza place. Favorite is the white pizza and the truffle oil Awesome
we ordered a Magheritta pizza and it was delicious! the staff was extremely gentle and noce. the beer good. it definitely exceeded our expectations!

Nice eatery with some outdoor cafe seating. Caesar salad was very tasty. Had the diavola (pepperoni) pizza, which was crispy and terrific. The sauce had a little spice to it and the pepperoni was flavorful. Service was friendly and efficient.
Fantastic pizza and atmosphere. Could be a bit faster but well worth the wait and then some. You won't be disappointed

Had a great time eating here with family and friends. Go on a warm night, sit outside and take your time with wine and food ... very enjoyable! Reasonable prices (for NYC), and enjoy the ambiance of Greenwich/SoHo.

column3: Perfect for lunch before a matinee show in the West Village!
column4: My 13-year-old daughter and I thoroughly enjoyed the caprese salad, the pizza, the dessert, and the espresso. It was the perfect meal. Outstanding! Great cozy atmosphere with brick walls. Excellent service and friendly staff.
I had their specific pizza Numero 28 pizza with an IPA beer. It was one of the tastiest pizzas I've ever had. The beer was bottled, standard.
Cash only! Our waitress was from Naples, charming and attentive. The salads were good and so was the pizza. We walked right in on a weekday night.
Doesn't look much from the outside and very small but well worth the wait. Although be prepared to wait a little they seriously need more staff.
The best pizza ever tried in New York. Polite and professional waiters and welcoming atmosphere. I also advise to try the Cheesecake dessert, so delicious!!
Best place ever! Pizza was great! The atmosphere is wonderful. Very Italian! We would go back anytime.

Wow where do I start, Waitresses very helpful and polite even though they was rushed of their feet, Food was awesome and fairly decent price wise, really lovely little place well decorated all in all great place to have a pizza.
Outstanding delicious pizza. 29 inch shared between three people. We were able to have different toppings which was great. Staff very friendly and you are able to take your own bottle of wine.

Went with some friends. Was able to bring our own bottle of wine, enjoy amazing pizza (you can do half and half with different toppings which is great) and enjoy a cozy atmosphere. Would definitely come back to try more of the pizzas!
I had lots of pizzas in New York but this is the best I ever had#pizzaüòÅüòéüòçüòáü§óüòè. And it's classy don't forget the flat screen TV they have.
You know the food is good when the staff speaks Italian. The pizza was so delicious. It was worth every penny. Order something special that you notmally wouldn't get, you wont be disappointed.
Not the best pizza I've ever had in New York, but close to the best service. Small, cozy place with attentive service. Recommended for sure.
Thank you for a memorable night! The food is amazing and the service is spot on. I can't wait to come back!

I ate here with my daughters and we all agreed the pizza was delicious. The ambiance is really nice too and service was fantastic. This is a really nice place to enjoy a delicious pizza. We will definitely return when in NYC
Probably the best Pizza i have ever had. Pasta was great too. The music was a bit too loud for my taste, bit all in all a 5 Star experience.
I'm Italian, I tried all the good pizzerias in NYC, this is by far the best !! And service is great too !!
Small a friendly restaurant, great bruschetta, and really great pizza. As it's small best to book and take cash.
Cute place, love the wine! A nice little haven in the middle of winter. Just happened upon this little gem.
Great pizza in NY. Nice environment. Only cash. Book a table. Family restaurant. Take your sit and enjoy!
Fantastic delicious pizza. Started with the bruschetta with was a must. Really good. Then had a pepperoni, mushroom, mozzarella, basil pizza. Well worth it. It was so good. I highly recommend.
Amazing pizza and bruschetta plus delicious half price wine on Tuesday night. Keep going back here and never disappointed

column3: Brick oven pizza on a cold winter night
column4: Amazing pizza and low key vibe. Always pleasant and worth the time A typical Italian place on Carmine St. Gets no better
The best pizza my wife & I've ever had. Stopped for a quick lunch. Friendly, fast service. Cash only but they have an ATM.

column3: good, but not what i expected
column4: Brick oven-yes. fresh and good toppings-yes. Excellent service-yes. If you want ny style pizza, this is not it. We will head to Bleecker street next to compare....
Great service and tasty pizza! We tried the gluten free pizza and it was a taste sensation! We will surely be back again!
We were there a few days ago, this place is beautiful and the pizza is good but for the price so high.
Tasty, great portion sizes and that wonderful American service. Obviously high on the calories but very worth it. Maybe skip breakfast.
Pizza was quite tasty but way too expensive and nothing special. We had one medium sized pizza which was suppose to be enough for 2/3 people, but yet we left a bit hungry

When I walked into the restaurant the place was great. And the pizza was better. I ordered a small pizza and it was the Best pizza I ever had in America. If you want a real Italian pizza go to this place!!!üëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëçüëç
Incredible thin crust pizza right in the village. Quaint restaurant. Cash only. There is an ATM in the restaurant.

column3: Not bad, but far from the best..
column4: Ordered several pizzas for a take-out. Interesting toppings (and combinations), thin crust, and slightly chewy dough. Not bad overall, but far from a couple of other pizza places that we tried on this trip (Don Antonio was the best).

This is a place to remember if you are a pizza lover like me. It's like Italian place in the heart of new york... Naples in the big city. Try everything, pizza, entrance, siders, everything is good (at least for me)
Excellent pizza, so much flavour and excellent value for money. Waiters know yhere wines and helpful to make sure you try it first.

column3: Very nice pizze / a good place!!
column4: Had a late lunch there. Simple decor, nice staff. Marguarita and Romeo pizze were very good. Large 14inches! Good glass of Primitivo. What else one would need after three hours walking in the City on a chilly and sunny day!!
Great food, great staff, great atmosphere. The appetizers main dishes and desserts are all excellent!

column3: Best Pizza And Not Just Pizza
column4: If your looking for a place for the best Pizza in NYC look no further. From the Pizza to the pasta to the unbelievable homemade dessert. You will NOT Be Disappointed.
We search for this place every time we are in NYC. The best pizza and greatest atmosphere! Love everything about it and will always return. Thank you for the great experience!!!!
Great service, great food, great ambiance! The trifecta! We customized our own pie and it came out exactly how we wanted. Great portion sizes too!
Cozy restaurant. Friendly service. Fresh salads, great appetizer, excellent pizza. However need to have cash to pay.
Nothing special, this is not a tipical italian pizza and... that's it! The italian pizza is much more soft.
Small, cozy restaurant.... with the best napolitana pizza. Tasty, crunchy and thin a must go when you visit New York.
My husband and I split the Numero 28 Specialty pizza and the spinach ravioli. They were both divine and we'll definitely be back!

Gnocchi and lasagne with red wine. Beautiful. Simply beautiful and good value for money. I'd recommend reservations as it's busy especially with the local new yorkers. Staff are great and well worth the money.

This place is quite small and not in little Italy but dont let that put you off. The pizza is amazing, especially as you can have multiple toppings on the sharing pizza. The service was great and it was reasonably priced. Recommend!
Worth the trip! Salads are fresh and delicious. Pizza is authentic Italian and perfectly baked. Attentive service in this quaint little restaurant. Make reservations. You will love it!

I have been here during a business trip to NYC - I have booked very early - entering the restaurant is like doing a trip in space and time . WONDERFUL pizza and a very friendly crew. Try pizza number 28 and their chocolate cake!
I love a place where the pizza is delicious, the service is molto bravo and I can speak Italian! We had the capricciosa pizza from the wood burning oven and a glass of Primitivo. Che buono!
A closy spot for great pizza and soups. Real Italian napoletan pizzeria run by an italian family. The waiters are real friendly.

column3: Evening of good pizza and beer!
column4: 10/10 thin crust pizza with chilled Peronis served next to a brick fired grill. Appetizers include bruschetta, meatballs, and salads.
I'd recommend this to all of my friends, its super homely, really nice waiting staff, and great location! Helps if you like pizza!
Tucked away in Greenwich, this gem has great food and a relaxed atmosphere. Perfect for tired legs after a nice walk on the high line! Will definitely come back!
One of the best Pizza in the city! I loved the antipasti as well... And great, friendly atmosphere. We were a group of 10 and had a very good time.
I brought my clients for a casual dinner and they loved it, it's the best real Italian pizza in New York. Imported straight from Italy.
Go there with Giuseppe and expect only the best. Food, company, and ambiance are always the best! Pizza 28 and diavola pizzas are amazing.
They have a great selection of dishes. I recommend especially delicious pizzas. the decor is very cozy and the service friendly and helpful
Delicious pizza! Lovely setting! Great vibe! Thoroughly recommend this place. Staff lovely too and great choice of pizza
Took us 20 minutes to get waited on after being seated at a table. Unfriendly staff. Soggy pizza. Skip it.
This is a true west village gem. If you want to have a taste of Italian pizza this is a must GO! My favorite is the Pizzeria28 pizza! ‚ù§Ô∏èüçï
Best pizza in NYC! Cozy atmosphere, super friendly staff. This is a neighborhood favorite, definitely worth checking out.
The best pizza in NYC! We love both the restaurant and delivery here - the pizza is amazing and service is excellent!

Went for accidental lunch while strolling the area. Best pasta we had in NYC by far...also, desserts were fabulous. Compared to high priced places in midtown, these guys have both quality and great value for money.
I was in pizzeria with a couple of friends. The pizza was great. We had caprese also as appetizer and desserts.. oh my god.. super good
The service is great the pizza is so authentic and delicious. They are kid friendly as well. Will definitely be back!

Great Italian pizza. Especially numero28!!! Nice romantic place for a date, music is beautiful. Service is great. We go here all the time. The location is so close to subway, so don't need to walk a lot

column3: Great pizza, cozy environment, must go
column4: 28 Pizzeria is wonderful! 1. The pizza is the real, delicious italian pizza, 2. The environment is extremely pleasant and 3. The people are very nice. Best option for pizza in NY. Just come prepared to pay cash only!
Best italian place in New York, very good service. Nice ambience, you really feel like you are in Italy! Carolina was our waitress and we received good service, i was impressed.
Pizza is very good, the dessert is the top and cooked with great passion. The service is generally good
Super thin New York pizza. She wasn't kidding when she said she could eat half a 18 inch. It's oblong shaped so it's not very big. Order extra

column3: Amazing piece of Italy in New York!!
column4: My boyfriend is gluten free and loves Italian food but can rarely have it now!! This place had a great gluten free menu and the food tasted amazing!! Great services and will be back!!!
Italian couple in NYC looking for a bufala. Just like we hoped to find it: awesomely tasteful. The wine list is short but exhaustive for a 'pizzeria'. The cannoli are just wonderful! Give it a try!!!

column3: Best pizza in my entire life!
column4: Come here for the real deal... The pizza here is the closest to Italy... You will never regret it! üçï
Nice restaurant in a nice neighbourhood. I enjoyed pasta just as much as I did back in Sicily ! Quite and peaceful place where you can come with friends otherwise with family.
My pasta was very fresh and very good! I recommend it! The waiter was very cool and understanding! Love this place !
A great place to eat pizza! I took lasagne it was delicious! Super restaurant italien! Les lasagnes √©taient d√©licieuses! Venez les roeuss''

Excellent pizza! Better than anywhere in NYC! Ambiance: casual and intimate. Pizza: gourmet. Taste: amazing! A reliable, go-to, place to take friends and family and clients. Brick oven pizza and Italian ingredients make perfect pizza. In all seriousness: go here!

column3: Best pizza in the west village
column4: My wife and I love this place and even after we moved from NY, we always have to go back every time we visit. Can't beat the pizza and the friendly atmosphere!!
Great times with friends! So fun. Such good pizza. Our waiter was awesome. He was so nice. Our dessert was good too.
Go, order the melanzane alla parmigiana, and enjoy the best one in town. We also ate pizza and a great wine, Montepulciano D'Abruzzo with a great price/quality ratio (bottle price $36)
Service was excellent and the pizza was the best of ever hadand for advice we can't get the current quality at home
Delicious pizza, just what we needed after a night at the theatre. So fresh and tasty. Restaurant was easy to find and the service impeccable too.
Good athmosphere and it felt like a real Italian place. The pizza was very good! I can highly recommend the place.
Very authentic Italian pizza. Great service. Lovely atmosphere. We are visiting from Texas and were delighted to find they have a location in Austin.

column3: Peace of Italy in the heart of West Village
column4: One of the best pizza in New York! If you want real taste of Italian pizza and practice your Italian you should not miss this spot!

We have spent here a really nice evening! Warm and friendly but above all the pizza is wonderful! Real pizza better than many pizzerias in Italy itself. I'll definitely come back. If you are near here try it!
Service was excellent! The pizza was awesome! It was my first time trying the wood-fire pizza and I love it!
The best pizzeria in Little Italy. Good service, nice atmosphere, I recommend this place to everyone who loves Italian cuisine.
Me and my friend were looking for somewhere nice and cost to eat and this was the perfect place! Great food, drink and service! Felt just like I was in Italy! Will definitely be coming back :)

column3: The best pizza in New York
column4: The service is always fantastic and the pizza is to die for! Every year I go to holiday to New York and this is always on my list of places to visit.
My favorite pizza place..in the world. I've had pizza in Italy and everywhere else - nothing compares to the delicious, fresh tasting pizza here at numero 28. A deff must try in NYC!
Greatest pizza ever! üçï and i know what great pizza tastes like as a New yorker! Very good wine, and the service was all right!
Would recommend this place for good quality food and friendly service. Pizza was delicious. Prices reasonable for NY.
Been to Italy 3 times..this place is totally comparable...Good food,friendly service..definitely will be back!
Awesome pizza! Light and airy. Cute place. Will definitely come back. Pizza is so flavorful. We got the margarita and numero 28 and both of them were delicious.
Amazing pizza... down to the last bite.. very quick service... was very enjoyable... Had a great experience here with my wife.
Medium pizza more than enough for two and fabulous Service terrific, atmosphere unique. Great for date night.

I go back to this place anytime I an in NYC and crave a pizza. The pizza is thick (Napoli style), and i normally prefer the thin ones (Romana style) but for this pizzeria i make an exception! Excellent ingredients and simplicity.

column3: Best Pizza we ate in the US of A!
column4: Authentic italian pizza and restaurant. We enjoyed it very much since we have been around a lot and this was by far one of the best! Very nice atmosphere and frindly waiters.
Love this restaurant great fantastic wow yummy delicious amazing spectacular 10/10 would recommend including me.

column3: Numero 28 food is more Italian than Italy
column4: We had the best Buffalo Mozerella ever, better than when we visited Italy. Fantastic Italian wine collection, unusual Bruschette on Pizza base. Intimate place with friendly staff.
I recommend the diavola and rustica! Perfect amount of sauce and spice! The location is perfect and I love the style/decorations inside! Very cozy!
What a magical place. Great food and great vibes. Check it out all day everyday. Get the pizza with the cheese on it! Heard it here first - You won't regret it
Best pizza spot in west village. I came here expecting a normal slice and ended up with a life changing experience
This place is electric, excellent pizza and vibes. I came with my friends and we had a really really good time.

column3: Great pizza, cozy place, nice service
column4: I've been there on Thursday night with my girlfriend. We had a lovely dinner, outstanding pizza. Love it
Great Wine, the atmosphere is nice, there is a nice smell of pizza inside. You can share a 29 inches pizza with your friends.

Even in Italy we have ever eaten a pizza so good like this and cozy environment delicate light, service professional and friendly and also the delivery is available You can't come to New York and not taste the pizza of nonna Eugenia
Best pizza! Best hospitality! You really feel at home! Cutest grandma owner! Try the 29inch and you can choose different flavors!
The best pizza of New York, good reception and the place is very good. I will came back! Italian wine and beer of the best quality.
This is one of our favorite pizza places in the city. We get an 18" and do 1/2 and 1/2 flavors, and split a salad. Always a favorite.
great ambiance I love the fall aesthetic the pumpkins on the table create a great feel. Came in and were seated immediately- truly authentic Italian pizzeria!

column3: Best Gluten Free Pizza in NYC
column4: Just ate the best Gluten free pizza in the City. The service is great and the food is terrific. Would recommend anyone who's in the area give it a try. It won't disappoint. We have gone back multiple times.
Nonna Eugenia's pizza reginella and torta alla crema are the best! Exquisite original italian recipes in a cozy ambience

column3: Authentic pizza in a wood burning oven
column4: The most authentic Neapolitan pizza made in a wood burning pizza oven.....right in Greenwich Village .....we were mesmerized while we watched our pizza being perfectly cooked.....a real Italian ristorante.....wonderful service.......and delicious food
Great spot in the village to go for delicious pizza. We got a large pie with one half o e thing and the other another so we could enjoy two different types.
We had the capricciosa and it was great. It has mozzarella, mushrooms, ham, olives, and articokes. This is a hidden gem right off Bleeker Street.
Excellent pizza! A must when in NYC! Amazing pasta too! We have also tried the Miami location. Very consistent
If your'e in the mood for pizza, this is the place. It's always a good sign when everyone around you and all of the waitresses are speaking Italian!
Una posta che I want to come back too soon! Great pizze! Order the numero 28, per favore! Tastes like you're back in Italy!

Came with a group of 14 and they managed to fit us in last minute... Excellent service! The food was delicious and authentic and the setting was perfect for our casual group. Especially good capricciosa! Love this restaurant and we will be back :)
Literally my favorite restaurant in Manhattan. Super friendly service, delicious food, and awesome ambiance! GO HERE!!!
We are sure to visit every time we are in New York and are never disappointed. Delicious, simple, and authentic.
Had a lovely time at this Pizza restaurant. Easily accommodated our group of 7 and nice to sit outside in the summer.
After walking around soho and Greenwich village we came for a wonderful lunch here. A PROPER Italian restaurant with great pizza pasta and prosecco
Love the pizza here! And the delicious salad with artichokes and shaved Parmesan cheese! Great atmosphere and good, friendly service!
Pizza was delicious! I highly recommend the Numero28 pizza. Delicious. Quick service, great wine, better pizza.

The pizza in this place is the best NY has to offer. You can share a pizza for two, this way you can try two different pizzas. The service is very friendly. You'll have to wait +- 10 minutes to get in.

Wow the giuletta pizza, oh mon dieu! I died and went to heaven! The pumpkin with the delicious buffalo mozzarella. And our waitress was so sweet and we loved conversing in Italian with her. Bravo, Numero 28! #foodgasm
Walking into this restaurant is like walking into a slice of Italy in the West Village, US of A. 10/10 would recommend
Great Pizza, quick and efficient service. Hi highly recommend it. We had the special Pizza #28. It was very flavorful. The espresso is also very good.
Our pizza and traditional bruschetta app were delicious! It was busy at Numero28 tonight, but we still had great service. Definitely recommend for a casual date night!
Amazing pizza! Thin crust, great sauce, fresh ingredients! Value for money for such an expensive city!

column3: Not bad for an italian pizza
column4: Pizza is OK but it's not the best you can eat in the USA. It's good but it's not worth the price....
great environment, great food, great time! Took a bit to get seated, but we got it after a bit of waiting and had a good time. the staff is friendly, the food is great!
Also my favorite olives! Love this place! Love love love! Also saw John Turturro here once, but I did the right thing. Good times!

The food and service were great. It is cash only so come prepared, although they do have an ATM inside. They even give you a free glass of wine if you check in on trip advisor! Definitely check it out :)!

Went in with some friends got a 29" pizza with three different kinds and shared it between the three of us. Food was fantastic and tasted very fresh. I only gave 4 stars because they were out of some ingridients otherwise it would've been 5!

Consistently our favorite gluten free sit-down pizza restaurant in the West Village....trust us - this charming casual spot is better than its more well known pizza places in the neighborhood....not to mention the sweetest staff and most helpful staff
I think it was one of the best pizza that i took in my life !! You need to go there and enjoy an italian pizza. I wish that i will return there. Thank you !!
Glad i got b We were 2 hungry dudes and the 18" and we enjoyed, the service is nice, the food is fresh and tasty, we are very happy Thanks alot, gracie
Good place for groups/ big parties. The 14inch is perfect for one person. Don't necessarily need a reservation however it likely helps to have one
Great for birthday dinners. Kind staff. Good food. The gluten free pizza is unreal. They brought out dessert for our friend. Great!
Amazing service and food. I highly recommend the Numerous 28 pizza. Couldn't ask for anything better! Perfect for big groups or a date night! üòò
Great prosciutto pizza and great staff!!! Came here for my friends 22nd birthday and we had an absolute blast. The BYOB aspect is wonderful!
This is the best pizza in New York City! Will definitely be eating here again the next time I'm here, and will recommend to friends and family.
Possibly the best pizza in New York City. Definitely legit Italian pizza. A must go to for anyone who loves pizza. Kind servers and good deals
Amazing pizza, owner personally waited on us & she was super friendly & helpful, highly recommended! In a fun area of town indoor or sidewalk seating
Went for dinner and had an amazing time. You can smell the pizza from the street and the atmosphere was really lively. Would definitely come again!
This pizzeria is just like being in Italy! Thin crust delicious and kids love it! It is in a great neighborhood nice for taking a walk afterwards.
Kids and adults love it! Great location and wonderful service. Will return the next time I come downtown to the Village.
Great pizza and casual atmosphere, a great neighborhood spot with tables outside. Very authentic Neapolitan pizzeria!

Great family style pizza. Very authentic and super delicious. Must be well known amongst Italians since when we were here our friends saw an Italian journalist. Recommend numero28 pizza and the San daniele.
I actually don't like pizza EXCEPT for numero 28 pizza. Have tried a few locations and they never disappoint! Jemma was a great hostess!
My son says this is the best pizza in the world! And we love it too. The thin tasty crust, the fresh sauce, cheese and veggies make it unique in nyc.
Amazing pizza, wonderful people and great spot!! Will be visiting again. Had pizza at another location and preferred this one.

column3: Great authentic Italian food and staff
column4: 2nd time I have been here, and it was on the recommendation from an Italian friend. The food is authentic Italian, pizzas are cooked in the wood fire oven. Genuinely friendly staff. They on,y take cash, no cards
I loved the authentic Italian vibe and how I could converse in Italian with the employees. The food was amazing and so fresh!
